deleteAccount.title: Delete account
deleteAccount.subtitle: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
deleteAccount.warning: This action cannot be undone. Your account will be deleted and all your data will be lost.

hideProfile.title: Hide profile
hideProfile.h1: Your profile will be hidden from other users
hideProfile.subtitle: You can unhide it anytime from settings

lockProfile.title: Extra Lock
lockProfile.h1: Your profile will be completely locked
lockProfile.subtitle: No one will be able to access your profile or data for the selected period

password.length: Password must be at least 6 characters

sessions.title: Sessions
sessions.subtitle: This section contains all active sessions that you can manage.
sessions.subtitle2: If you notice a session whose details you don't know or notice a new suspicious login, we recommend changing the password and activating 2FA

support.title: Support
support.subtitle: You can support our project on various platforms, thereby helping in the further development of the community and improvement of technologies
support.subtitle2: By supporting us, you become a volunteer and an active member of the community, you will have access to increased privileges
support.subtitle3: We are an open community and encourage improvements and suggestions from our users, and also host interesting projects and code on our Github

nickname.length: Nickname must be no more than 50 characters
nickname.invalid: Nickname can only contain Latin letters, Cyrillic letters and spaces

password.length: Password must be at least 6 characters

bio.length: Bio must be no more than 300 characters
